resources.string:
Enable Super Cleaner here to: 
1. Boost device and get extra performance 
2. Stop battery draining apps 
3. Clean system junks 
4. Reduce 50% power consumption, extend phone standby time 
 
We solemnly promise: 
Super Cleaner will NEVER collect any privacy information. 
 
Please note that: 
There is a standard confirmation procedure when enabling Accessibility Service on all Android device. If you receive these privacy warnings, just ignore them please.
